00026 #ifndef NEWTS_NOTESFILE_H

00036 enum nf_statuses
00037   {
00038     NF_ANONYMOUS    = 01,  
00039     NF_CONFIDENTIAL = 02,  
00042     NF_LOCKED       = 04,  
00043     NF_ARCHIVE      = 010, 
00044     NF_MODERATED    = 020, 
00045     NF_POLICY       = 040  
00046   };
00047 
00052 struct notesfile
00053 {
00054   struct nfref *ref;      
00055   char *title;            
00056   char *director_message; 
00059   unsigned total_notes;   
00060   time_t modified;        
00062   time_t time_entered;    
00065   int options;            
00066   short perms;            
00068   struct opts *opts;      
00070 };
00071 
00072 /* struct opts - standard Newts option file.
00073  *
00074  * If your module needs custom options, you should define a struct for them in
00075  * your module and be prepared to cast it back and forth with this type. Size
00076  * is currently subject to change.
00077  *
00078  * Better way to handle this pending.
00079  */
00080 
00081 struct opts
00082 {
00083   int zero[10];
00084 };
